front.title: Signaling-based configuration for supporting multiple upstream interfaces in IGMP/MLD proxies

abstract.t: The support of multiple upstream interfaces in IGMP/MLD proxies requires the capability of configuring the different upstream interfaces for specific multicast channels/sessions. Recently [RFC9279] has defined a message extension mechanism for IGMP and MLD. This document leverages on that for proposing extension for signaling-based configuration the multiple upstream interfaces in IGMP/MLD proxies.
